Jean-Claude Grumberg https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jean-Claude_Grumberg 0 Jean-Claude Grumberg (born 1939) is a French writer of children's books and a playwright. Jean-Claude_Grumberg ( born 1939 ) is a_French_writer of children 's_books and a_playwright .
